wikipedia_page.main: Elizabeth Pattinson (born 14 November 1983) is an English singer and songwriter.

response: * Lizzy Pattinson, English singer and songwriter

link_mentions.page: List of Billboard Hot Dance Club Play number ones of 2004

response: In 2003, "Let the Sun Shine", an Ibiza-inspired re-make of The 5th Dimension's No. 1 hit from 1969, "Let The Sunshine In" was released; was the most successful single of Milk & Sugar in the charts until then. It reached No. 1 in Hungary and the US Billboard Hot Dance Club Songs chart, as well as the Top 20 in the UK (#18), Greece, the Netherlands and Spain. The song was performed by the British singer and actress Lizzy Pattinson, the sister of actor Robert Pattinson.
* Milk & Sugar feat. Lizzy Pattinson – Let the Sun Shine (2012)

link_mentions.page: List of artists who reached number one on the U.S. Dance Club Songs chart

response: "Dreaming" is a single by Aurora with vocals by Lizzy Pattinson. It reached number 24 on the UK Singles Chart in 2002.
"The Day It Rained Forever" is a single by Aurora with vocals by Lizzy Pattinson. It reached number 29 on the UK Singles Chart in 2002.
* Milo.nl & CJ Stone feat. Lizzy Pattinson – "Surrender" (2008)
